author: Not available
source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry

text.0: Is ðeos burch breome      geond Breotenrice,
text.3: ea yðum stronge,      and ðer inne wunað
text.5: And ðær gewexen is      wudafæstern micel;
text.6: wuniad in ðem wycum      wilda deor monige,
text.8: Is in ðere byri eac      bearnum gecyðed
text.11: Osuualdes, Engle leo,      and Aidan biscop,
text.13: Is ðer inne midd heom      æðelwold biscop
text.14: and breoma bocera Beda,      and Boisil abbot,
text.16: lerde lustum,      and he his lara wel genom.
text.17: Eardiæð æt ðem eadige      in in ðem minstre
text.19: ðær monia wundrum gewurðað,      ðes ðe writ seggeð,
text.20: midd ðene drihnes wer      domes bideð.
